alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 20 at 9:32PM CDT until April 21 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility to 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Carlton and South St. Louis County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of dense fog are occurring in the elevated terrain around Duluth this evening with visibilities dropping to 1/4 mile or less. Areas most likely to see dense fog will be along Interstate 35 between Cloquet and Proctor, Hermantown, and higher terrain areas of Duluth. Conditions may begin to improve around midnight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
